meanings.definition: A very small or microscopic animal.
meanings.sent1: Under the microscope, the animalcules were barely visible.
meanings.sent2: The pond water was teeming with tiny animalcules.
meanings.sent3: The animalcules had a party in the drop of water.
meanings.sent4: In the world of the pond, the animalcules were like bustling cities.
meanings.sent5: The scientist marveled at the intricate world of the animalcules.

meanings.definition: A tiny organism, especially a protozoan or other minute organism.
meanings.sent1: The ocean is home to countless animalcules.
meanings.sent2: Microscopes help us study the behavior of small animalcules.
meanings.sent3: The animalcules raced each other in the microscopic world.
meanings.sent4: In the drop of water, the animalcules were like stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The diversity of animalcules in the soil is astonishing.
